_comment_purpose: Monitors GPIO presence pins for field-replaceable units (FRUs). Each entry maps a GPIO line to an inventory D-Bus object. When the GPIO is asserted the 'Present' property is set to true; when deasserted it is set to false.
_comment_naming: GPIO names ending in _PRSNT_N are active-low (low = present). The daemon handles the polarity inversion internally.

gpio_configs._comment: PSU 0 presence -- active low. Tracks whether the first power supply is seated in its bay. Used by phosphor-psu-monitor for power redundancy calculations.
gpio_configs.name: PSU0_PRSNT_N

gpio_configs._comment: PSU 1 presence -- active low. Second power supply slot for redundant configurations.
gpio_configs.name: PSU1_PRSNT_N

gpio_configs._comment: DIMM A0 presence -- active low. Indicates whether the memory module in slot A0 is populated. Presence data feeds into the host inventory and Redfish Memory collection.
gpio_configs.name: DIMM_A0_PRSNT_N

gpio_configs._comment: DIMM B0 presence -- active low. Second memory channel slot.
gpio_configs.name: DIMM_B0_PRSNT_N

gpio_configs._comment: PCIe riser card 0 presence -- active low. Riser card that holds add-in cards (GPUs, NICs) in slot 0. Absence may indicate a maintenance event.
gpio_configs.name: RISER0_PRSNT_N

gpio_configs._comment: NVMe drive 0 presence -- active low. Front-panel hot-swap drive bay 0. Monitored continuously to update Redfish Storage/Drive inventory on hot-plug events.
gpio_configs.name: NVME0_PRSNT_N

gpio_configs._comment: NVMe drive 1 presence -- active low. Front-panel hot-swap drive bay 1.
gpio_configs.name: NVME1_PRSNT_N
